meanings.definition: A person who rides a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: The bicycler rode down the street with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bicycler on the trail this morning.
meanings.sent3: The bicycler tried to juggle while riding but dropped everything.
meanings.sent4: She was a swift bicycler, gliding through the city like a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The young bicycler's enthusiasm was contagious as he pedaled around the park.

meanings.sent1: I love to bicycler in the park on weekends.
meanings.sent2: He will bicycler to work instead of driving.
meanings.sent3: She decided to bicycler to the store for some exercise.
meanings.sent4: The children bicyclered around the neighborhood, laughing and chatting.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, they continued to bicycler along the peaceful path.
